title: Ginger wine and whisky fruit cake
description: This tea cake is laced with ginger wine and whisky for a beautifully moist, flavourful cake. It will keep for at least six months.
ingredients: 200ml/7fl oz ginger 'wine' (preferably a non-alcoholic version, such as Glendale)
50ml/2fl oz whisky, plus extra for feeding the cake
